title: Easy Indian Butter Chicken Recipe
description: This creamy butter chicken recipe combines fragrant spices with simple ingredients like onion, butter, and tomato sauce for a tasty curry dish.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Curries Chicken Easy Indian Butter Chicken 4.7 (1,301) 957 Reviews 156 Photos An easy butter chicken recipe I've perfected over the years and shared with many others. The sauce is perfect when creamy and not too thick or too thin. The level of salt and spices can be suited to your taste. Garam and tandoori masala can be found in the ethnic aisle of your grocery store. By mn Updated on May 6, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 156 156 156 156 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 45 mins Total Time: 1 hr Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 cup butter, divided 1 onion, minced 1 tablespoon minced garlic 1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce 3 cups heavy cream 2 teaspoons salt 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1 teaspoon garam masala 1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized chunks 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 2 tablespoons tandoori masala Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in onion and garlic, and cook slowly until the onion caramelizes to a dark brown, about 15 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Meanwhile, combine cream, tomato sauce, remaining butter, salt, cayenne pepper, and garam masala in a saucepan over medium-high heat; bring to a simmer. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes. Stir in caramelized onions. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios While the sauce is simmering, toss chicken with vegetable oil until coated. Season with tandoori masala and spread out onto a baking sheet. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake chicken in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 12 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Add cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for 5 minutes before serving. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 2,383 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 880 Calories 82g Fat 13g Carbs 26g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 880 % Daily Value * Total Fat 82g 106% Saturated Fat 48g 242% Cholesterol 303mg 101% Sodium 1461mg 64% Total Carbohydrate 13g 5% Dietary Fiber 3g 9% Total Sugars 5g Protein 26g 53% Vitamin C 11mg 12% Calcium 134mg 10% Iron 2mg 10% Potassium 567mg 12% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Indian Butter Chicken 01 of 156 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 156 Photo by  QuaintTongs5284 01/03/2025 A keeper! My family loves this butter chicken. If I don't feel like using my oven, I just pan-fry the chicken and then add it to the sauce. Delicious with Basmati rice and some tender green peas.If you don't have any tandoori spice, make your own with one of the recipes on this website. 03 of 156 Photo by  ToastyRib5866 12/06/2024 OK with tweaks NOTES:-use way less butter!!! Better to use less and then add more later if needed.-Start off with about 2 cups double cream and add more if needed.-Add tandoori masala to the actual pot too, and add more garam masala etc!-Also i used tomato paste (about half a tube) instead of the sauce 04 of 156 Photo by  Elaine Smith 01/16/2024 Good recipe. My only change was to add ginger and I used slightly less cream (only because I didn't quite have enough). Will make again. 05 of 156 Photo by  Lisa cooks 01/14/2024 I loved it. I added curry and a touch of brown sugar. Wow! Will make many times again. Will try it with evaporated milk next time. 06 of 156 Photo by  sare 03/13/2022 I made this recipe once exactly as it shows (picture) and a second time with the suggestions in the reviews. The original recipe is horribly greasy. I had to constantly stir the sauce to get all the butter and grease to mix with the cream. The taste was okay but I felt gross eating this. 1 cup of butter and 3 cups of cream is nasty.I made this again with a suggestion that said 1/4 cup butter instead of 1 cup and 1 can of evaporated milk instead of 3 cups cream. It made the sauce thicker and made it smell more like a real curry sauce. No grease! The new version is my absolute favourite and I make it every month 5/5 stars and it's healthier. I also don't add any salt. You don't need it. 07 of 156 Photo by  mike 03/12/2022 amazing but not that easy 08 of 156 Photo by  Cas 11/22/2021 I absolutely love this recipe!! Pretty easy to make, and tastes delicious! I followed the advice in the comments and used coconut milk instead of heavy cream, and I also used thighs instead of breasts/added in mushrooms. Other than those changes, I basically followed the recipe and served w curry basmati rice. Will definitely be saving this recipe for special occasions! 09 of 156 Photo by  Tiffany S 08/09/2021 I have made this recipe many times now and my family is insanely in love with it!! I follow the recipe for the most part but I’m one of those people that seasons to taste so I use a bit more garam malsala and I add tandoori masala to the sauce. It is absolutely DELICIOUS!!!! Obviously if my family is asking for it regularly!!! Thank you for this recipe!!!! 10 of 156 Photo by  ExcellentEmmy 07/22/2021 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Indian Chicken Curry 1,596 Ratings Chicken Korma 37 Ratings Chicken Makhani (Indian Butter Chicken) 1,386 Ratings Indian Chicken Tikka Masala 31 Ratings Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani) 47 Ratings Instant Pot Indian Chicken Curry 19 Ratings Chicken Cauliflower Korma 35 Ratings Murgh Makhani (Indian Butter Chicken) 136 Ratings Chicken Tikka 1 Rating Slow Cooker Chicken Jalfrezi 4 Ratings Chicken Tikka Masala 2,994 Ratings Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Tikka Masala 144 Ratings Indian Chicken Tikka Skewers 1 Rating Easy Chicken Madras Recipe 6 Ratings Slow Cooker Chicken Curry 8 Ratings Makhani Murgh (Butter Chicken) 7 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
